tools.name: bam2sam
tools.description: convert bam files to sam files
tools.code:
{
  "name": "bam2sam",
  "description": "convert bam files to sam files",
  "invoke": "samtools view",
  "inputlists": [
    "/Users/zhouanbo/ElectronProjects/pipelinedog/examples/cuffdiff/INPUT.list.txt"
  ],
  "options": [
    "-h",
    "{INPUT}",
    "{OUTPUT}"
  ],
  "input_option": "{-B|'l'A}",
  "output_option": "{1B|'.sam'E|'l'A}",
  "output_files": [
    "{P1B|'.sam'E|'a'A}"
  ]
}

codeobj.name: bam2sam
codeobj.description: convert bam files to sam files

tools.parsedCommand:
samtools view -h ControlCr.rep1.cxb ControlCr.sam&
samtools view -h ControlCr.rep2.cxb ControlCr.sam&
samtools view -h ControlCr.rep3.cxb ControlCr.sam&
samtools view -h Cdx2koCr.rep1.cxb Cdx2koCr.sam&
samtools view -h Cdx2koCr.rep2.cxb Cdx2koCr.sam&
samtools view -h BrafHetCr.rep1.cxb BrafHetCr.sam&
samtools view -h BrafHetCr.rep2.cxb BrafHetCr.sam&
samtools view -h Cdx2BrafCr.rep1.cxb Cdx2BrafCr.sam&
samtools view -h Cdx2BrafCr.rep2.cxb Cdx2BrafCr.sam&
samtools view -h SmadBrafCr.rep1.cxb SmadBrafCr.sam&
